duties_responsibilities.duty: Promoting a culture of accountability to meet or exceed the store’s goals related to retail and service sales, guest loyalty, payroll, and omni-channel initiatives.
Meeting/exceeding goals related to services, boutiques, makeup, skincare, fragrance, pro hair, and personal care appliance merchandise sales and service sales.
Planning and executing in-store events that deliver an unrivaled guest experience, driving brand partner collaboration and delivering on sales and payroll goals.
Attracting and building a highly engaged team, effectively collaborating, prioritizing work, and coaching to drive guest loyalty.
Establishing performance metrics for the team, managing service and boutique supply inventory, and communicating and providing feedback to field leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree is preferred, but not required
